hero.heading: Welcome to Huble Developer Kit
hero.description: Modern HubSpot development with React, design tokens, and islands architecture. Build fast, scalable, multi-brand websites with confidence.

features.title: Design Tokens
features.description: Single source of truth for visual design. Compile to CSS custom properties and TypeScript constants.

features.title: Islands Architecture
features.description: Fast loading with minimal JavaScript. Server-rendered by default, hydrate only where needed.

features.title: Zero Duplication
features.description: React components are mapped to HubSpot modules via thin adapters. Write UI logic once.

features.title: Atomic Design
features.description: Component library organized as atoms, molecules, and organisms for maximum reusability.

features.title: Multi-Brand Support
features.description: Scale to multiple brands by swapping design token files. Same components, different branding.

features.title: Developer Experience
features.description: Localhost preview with mock content. No HubSpot dependency during development.
